name: Text To Speech
description: Generate natural-sounding speech from text using ElevenLabs API. Supports multiple voices including singing voice, voice settings, and high-quality audio output. Perfect for creating podcasts, audiobooks, voiceovers, songs, and audio content. For singing: set ELEVENLABS_SINGING_VOICE_ID env var to a voice ID that can sing, or it will use a default expressive voice with high style settings.

text.description: Text to convert to speech or lyrics to sing (max 5000 characters per request)

voice_preset.description: Voice preset optimized for different use cases. 'singing' uses a voice and settings optimized for musical performance. 'narrative' for audiobooks. 'conversational' for natural dialogue. 'dramatic' for storytelling. 'calm' for meditation/relaxation. 'energetic' for announcements/ads.

voice_id.description: Voice ID to use (optional, overrides voice_preset selection). Use list_voices to see available voices.

voice_settings.description: Voice customization settings (optional, overrides preset defaults)

stability.description: Voice stability (0-1). Higher = more consistent, lower = more expressive. Singing uses lower stability.

style.description: Style exaggeration (0-1). Higher values add more character.

model_id.description: Model to use for generation. Turbo models are faster but may have less quality.

output_path.description: Custom output path. If not specified, saves to storage/audio/generated/

examples.description: Generate a song with singing voice

input.text: Oh the sun shines bright, on this beautiful day, I'm feeling alive in every way
Welcome to this peaceful meditation session. Take a deep breath and relax.
